Class.summary: Represents a MySql transaction to be made in a MyMySql database. This class cannot be inherited.
Class.remarks: The application creates a MyMySqlTransaction object by calling on the object. All subsequent operations associated with the transaction (for example, committing or aborting the transaction), are performed on the MyMySqlTransaction object.

Rollback.summary: Rolls back a transaction from a pending state.
Rollback.remarks: The Rollback method is equivalent to the MyMySql statement ROLLBACK. The transaction can only be rolled back from a pending state (after BeginTransaction has been called, but before Commit is called).

Commit.remarks: The Commit method is equivalent to the MyMySql MySql statement COMMIT.
